${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you change the constructor of your card to use super(cardInfo, true); this will be the card's description when it is upgraded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Fire.NAME: Fire
${modID}:Fire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Astral_Fire. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to draw pile.
${modID}:Fire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Astral_Fire. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to draw pile.

${modID}:Fira.NAME: Fira
${modID}:Fira.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Astral_Fire. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to draw pile.
${modID}:Fira.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Astral_Fire. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to draw pile.

${modID}:Firaga.NAME: Firaga
${modID}:Firaga.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Astral_Fire. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to draw pile.
${modID}:Firaga.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Astral_Fire. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to draw pile.

${modID}:Blizzard.NAME: Blizzard
${modID}:Blizzard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Umbral_Ice. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to discard pile.
${modID}:Blizzard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Umbral_Ice. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to discard pile.

${modID}:Blizzara.NAME: Blizzara
${modID}:Blizzara.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Umbral_Ice. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to discard pile.
${modID}:Blizzara.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Umbral_Ice. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to discard pile.

${modID}:Blizzaga.NAME: Blizzaga
${modID}:Blizzaga.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Umbral_Ice. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to discard pile.
${modID}:Blizzaga.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Umbral_Ice. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to discard pile.

${modID}:Thunder.NAME: Thunder
${modID}:Thunder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Ranged damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to hand.
${modID}:Thunder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Ranged damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to hand.

${modID}:Thundara.NAME: Thundara
${modID}:Thundara.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Ranged damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to hand.
${modID}:Thundara.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Ranged damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL ${modID}:Level-Up to hand.

${modID}:Thundaga.NAME: Thundaga
${modID}:Thundaga.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Ranged damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL ${modID}:Delevel and gain a 'Lightning Materia' to Hand.
${modID}:Thundaga.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Ranged damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL ${modID}:Delevel and gain a 'Lightning Materia' to Hand.

${modID}:CLDefend.NAME: Arcane Defend
${modID}:CLDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! !temporary_hp! Temporary HP.

${modID}:CLStrike.NAME: Dia
${modID}:CLStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged Damage. NL Deal !M! ${modID}:Ranged damage to ALL other enemies.

${modID}:Aero.NAME: Aero
${modID}:Aero.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged Damage. NL Half of this damage ignores Block.

${modID}:Haste.NAME: Haste
${modID}:Haste.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and gain [E].

${modID}:TimeMateria.NAME: Time Materia
${modID}:TimeMateria.DESCRIPTION: Choose to either add the ${modID}:Spell 'Haste' or 'Slow' to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:TimeMateria.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add the ${modID}:Spells 'Haste' and 'Slow' to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Demi.NAME: Demi
${modID}:Demi.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 30% of the targets current HP. NL This damage cannot reduce the target's HP below 1.
${modID}:Demi.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 30% of the targets current HP. NL This damage cannot reduce the target's HP below 1.

${modID}:MinusStrike.NAME: Minus Strike
${modID}:MinusStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the difference between your Max HP and current HP. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:MinusStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the difference between your Max HP and current HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AutoRegan.NAME: Auto-Regan
${modID}:AutoRegan.DESCRIPTION: At the start of combat gain !M! #Regan. NL LevelUp to Draw Pile.
${modID}:AutoRegan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of combat gain !M! Regan. NL LevelUp to Draw Pile.

${modID}:MagicStone.NAME: Magic Stone
${modID}:MagicStone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL Gain 1 Energy when Exhausted.

${modID}:BLKStrike.NAME: Scathe
${modID}:BLKStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged Damage with a !M!% chance to deal double damage.

${modID}:Lvl3Def.NAME: LV3 Def-Less
${modID}:Lvl3Def.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! !VULNERABLE! Vulnerable and Weak if current floor is divisible by 3. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Lvl5Death.NAME: LV5 Death
${modID}:Lvl5Death.DESCRIPTION: If current floor is divisible by 5, set the enemies HP to 0. NL Does not effect Elites or Bosses. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GilToss.NAME: Gil Toss
${modID}:GilToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M1! - !M2! damage. 1 Gold equals +1% damage. NL Lose gold equal to the damage.

${modID}:ThousandStabs.NAME: Thousand Stabs
${modID}:ThousandStabs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! x !M! damage. NL Increase this card's number of attacks by 1 this combat.

${modID}:Curaga.NAME: Curaga
${modID}:Curaga.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL ${modID}:Delevel and gain a 'Healing Materia' to Discard.

${modID}:Draw.NAME: Draw
${modID}:Draw.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw 1 Card. NL ${modID}:Revolving !ffzim:M2!: Undraw.
${modID}:Draw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw 2 Cards. NL ${modID}:Revolving !ffzim:M2!: Undraw.

${modID}:Undraw.NAME: Undraw
${modID}:Undraw.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Place 1 card in your hand on top of your draw pile.  NL ${modID}:Revolving !ffzim:M2!: Draw.
${modID}:Undraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Place 2 cards in your hand on top of your draw pile.  NL ${modID}:Revolving !ffzim:M2!: Draw.

${modID}:Redraw.NAME: Redraw
${modID}:Redraw.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your hand into your draw pile, then draw that many cards. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Redraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your hand into your draw pile, then draw that many cards (+1).

${modID}:Play.NAME: Play
${modID}:Play.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in hand. NL Play that card, it costs 0. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Play.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in hand. NL Play that card, it costs 0.

${modID}:JOBWhiteMage.NAME: White Mage
${modID}:JOBWhiteMage.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Job. NL Enhance ${modID}:Limit_Break with Eidolon. NL Obtain the Jewel Card.

${modID}:TheBlackestNight.NAME: The Blackest Night
${modID}:TheBlackestNight.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to 25% of Max HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:LivingShadow.NAME: Living Shadow
${modID}:LivingShadow.DESCRIPTION: Add a ${modID}:Shadow copy of every card in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SyphonStrike.NAME: Syphon Strike
${modID}:SyphonStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL NL If you do unblocked damage, NL Refund !M!.

${modID}:BladeBarrier.NAME: Blade Barrier
${modID}:BladeBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain !B! !BLOCK! Block and !M! Thorns. NL At the start of next turn, lose !M! Thorns.

${modID}:WhiteDraw.NAME: White Draw
${modID}:WhiteDraw.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Card. NL Gain [E] equal to its cost.
${modID}:WhiteDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Gain [E] equal to the highest cost card drawn.

${modID}:ShadowWall.NAME: Shadow Wall
${modID}:ShadowWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this is not a ${modID}:Shadow Copy, add a ${modID}:Shadow Copy of 'Shadow Wall' to your hand.
${modID}:ShadowWall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this is not a ${modID}:Shadow Copy, add a ${modID}:Shadow Copy of 'Shadow Wall' to your hand.

${modID}:Bio.NAME: Bio
${modID}:Bio.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL !ffzim:M2!% chance to apply ${modID}:Venom. NL ${modID}:Level-Up.

${modID}:Biora.NAME: Biora
${modID}:Biora.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL !ffzim:M2!% chance to apply ${modID}:Venom. NL ${modID}:Level-Up.

${modID}:Bioga.NAME: Bioga
${modID}:Bioga.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL !ffzim:M2!% chance to apply ${modID}:Venom. NL ${modID}:Level-Up.

${modID}:ElusiveJump.NAME: Elusive Jump
${modID}:ElusiveJump.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !ffzim:M2! ${modID}:Jump. NL Next turn gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Plunge.NAME: Plunge!
${modID}:Plunge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Jump. NL ${modID}:Dive. NL Deal !D! plus double ${modID}:Jump amount damage. NL Lose !ffzim:M2! HP.
${modID}:Plunge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Jump. NL ${modID}:Dive. NL Deal !D! plus triple ${modID}:Jump amount damage. NL Lose !ffzim:M2! HP.

${modID}:SelfDestruct.NAME: Self-Destruct
${modID}:SelfDestruct.DESCRIPTION: End your turn. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If there are any enemies still alive, die.
${modID}:SelfDestruct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: End your turn. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If there are any enemies still alive, die.

${modID}:Float.NAME: Float
${modID}:Float.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Jump. NL ${modID}:Dive. NL Deal !D! plus double ${modID}:Jump amount damage. NL Lose !ffzim:M2! HP.
${modID}:Float.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Jump. NL ${modID}:Dive. NL Deal !D! plus triple ${modID}:Jump amount damage. NL Lose !ffzim:M2! HP.

${modID}:SwordMagic.NAME: Sword Magic
${modID}:SwordMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose and play a ${modID}:Spell Attack card. NL It is not a ${modID}:Spell, costs 0 and deals half damage. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SwordMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose and play a ${modID}:Spell Attack card. NL It is not a ${modID}:Spell, costs 0 and deals half damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AutoCounter.NAME: Auto Counter
${modID}:AutoCounter.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, play a copy of your ${modID}:Job or basic Strike card against the attacker.
${modID}:AutoCounter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When attacked the next !M! times, play a copy of a your ${modID}:Job or basic Strike card against the attacker.

${modID}:FleeGil.NAME: Flee Gil
${modID}:FleeGil.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, play a copy of your ${modID}:Job or basic Strike card against the attacker.
${modID}:FleeGil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When attacked the next !M! times, play a copy of a your ${modID}:Job or basic Strike card against the attacker.

${modID}:TestCard.NAME: Test Card
${modID}:TestCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When attacked the next !M! times, play a copy of a your ${modID}:Job or basic Strike card against the attacker.

${modID}:CherryBlossom.NAME: Test Card
${modID}:CherryBlossom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage to ALL enemies. NL Strength affects this card !M! times.

${modID}:FireMateria.NAME: Fire Materia
${modID}:FireMateria.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: !M! / !ffzim:M2! [${modID}:ApRewardIcon]  NL Choose and pay for 'Fire' or 'Fira', play it. NL ${modID}:Eidolon - Ifrit.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: !M! / !ffzim:M2! [${modID}:ApRewardIcon]  NL Choose and pay for 'Fire', 'Fira' or 'Firaga', play it. NL ${modID}:Eidolon - Ifrit.

${modID}:HealingMateria.NAME: Healing Materia
${modID}:HealingMateria.DESCRIPTION: [ffzim:StarLeftEmptyIcon] [ffzim:StarMiddleEmptyIcon] [ffzim:StarMiddleEmptyIcon] [ffzim:StarMiddleEmptyIcon] [ffzim:StarRightEmptyIcon]  NL !M! / !ffzim:M2!  NL Play 'Cure'. NL Summon ${modID}:Eidolon Ifrit: Hellfire.
${modID}:HealingMateria.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: !M! / !ffzim:M2!  NL Choose 'Cure' or 'Cura', it plays. NL Summon ${modID}:Eidolon Ifrit: Hellfire.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Choose 'Cure' or 'Cura', pay its cost and play it. NL ${modID}:Eidolon - Ifrit.
NL Choose 'Cure', 'Cura' or 'Curaga', pay its cost and play it. NL Summon ${modID}:Eidolon Ifrit: Hellfire.

${modID}:IceMateria.NAME: Ice Materia
${modID}:IceMateria.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Materia, NL Cast 'Fire'. NL Summon ${modID}:Eidolon Ifrit: Hellfire.
${modID}:IceMateria.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Materia, NL Cast 'Fira'. NL Summon ${modID}:Eidolon Ifrit: Hellfire.

${modID}:LightningMateria.NAME: Lightning Materia
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Materia, NL !M! / !ffzim:M2! MAX. NL Cure, Cura, Curaga

${modID}:TestMulti.NAME: TestMulti
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Materia, NL !M! / !ffzim:M2! MAX. NL Cure, Cura, Curaga

${modID}:Jewel.NAME: Jewel
${modID}:Jewel.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Materia to your hand.

${modID}:Garnet.NAME: Garnet
${modID}:Garnet.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gem, NL Cast *Cure. NL Summon ${modID}:Eidolon Bahamut: Mega Flare.
${modID}:Garnet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gem, NL Cast *Cura. NL Summon ${modID}:Eidolon Bahamut: Mega Flare.

${modID}:Amethyst.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gem, NL Cast *Cure. NL Summon ${modID}:Eidolon Bahamut: Mega Flare.

${modID}:Diamond.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gem, NL Cast *Cure. NL Summon ${modID}:Eidolon Bahamut: Mega Flare.

${modID}:Emerald.NAME: Emerald:
${modID}:Emerald.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gem, NL Cast *Cure. NL Summon ${modID}:Eidolon Bahamut: Mega Flare.

${modID}:Moonstone.NAME: Moonstone
${modID}:Moonstone.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gem, NL Cast *Cure. NL Summon ${modID}:Eidolon Bahamut: Mega Flare.

${modID}:Ruby.NAME: Ruby
${modID}:Ruby.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gem, NL Cast *Cure. NL Summon ${modID}:Eidolon Bahamut: Mega Flare.

${modID}:Peridot.NAME: Peridot
${modID}:Peridot.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gem, NL Cast *Cure. NL Summon ${modID}:Eidolon Bahamut: Mega Flare.

${modID}:Opal.NAME: Opal
${modID}:Opal.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gem, NL Cast *Cure. NL Summon ${modID}:Eidolon Bahamut: Mega Flare.

${modID}:Topaz.NAME: Topaz
${modID}:Topaz.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gem, NL Cast *Cure. NL Summon ${modID}:Eidolon Bahamut: Mega Flare.

${modID}:Vanish.NAME: Vanish
${modID}:Vanish.DESCRIPTION: For the next 2 turns, every 2 turns gain 1 Intangible.
${modID}:Vanish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL For the next 2 turns, every 2 turns gain 1 Intangible.

${modID}:FourTonzeWeight.NAME: 4-tonze Weight
${modID}:FourTonzeWeight.DESCRIPTION: For the next 2 turns, every 2 turns gain 1 Intangible.
${modID}:FourTonzeWeight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL For the next 2 turns, every 2 turns gain 1 Intangible.

${modID}:Potion.NAME: Potion
${modID}:Potion.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Potion. NL Gain !M! !temporary_hp! Temporary HP. NL Fleeting.

${modID}:HiPotion.NAME: Hi-Potion
${modID}:HiPotion.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Potion. NL Gain !M! !temporary_hp! Temporary HP. NL Fleeting.

${modID}:XPotion.NAME: X-Potion
${modID}:XPotion.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Potion. NL Gain !M! !temporary_hp! Temporary HP. NL Fleeting.

${modID}:AddStatus.NAME: Add-Status
${modID}:AddStatus.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a debuff card from your hand. NL Gain ${modID}:Add-Status, applying the cards eligible debuffs.
${modID}:AddStatus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a debuff card from your hand. NL Gain ${modID}:Add-Status, applying the cards eligible debuffs.

${modID}:ShakeItOff.NAME: Shake It Off
${modID}:ShakeItOff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you took damage this or last turn, gain !B! Block again.

${modID}:RawIntuition.NAME: Raw Intuition
${modID}:RawIntuition.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise deal !D! damage.

${modID}:DoubleCast.NAME: Doublecast
${modID}:DoubleCast.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next ${modID}:Spell is played twice.
${modID}:DoubleCast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! ${modID}:Spells are played twice.

${modID}:GroupCast.NAME: Group-cast
${modID}:GroupCast.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next played ${modID}:Spell card targeting an enemy is duplicated for each remaining enemy, targeting them. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AutoLife.NAME: Auto-Life
${modID}:AutoLife.DESCRIPTION: Startup. NL Gain ${modID}:Auto-Life. NL When ${modID}:Auto-Life triggers, destroy this card.
${modID}:AutoLife.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Startup. NL Shuffle a Magic Stone into your draw pile. NL Gain ${modID}:Auto-Life. NL When ${modID}:Auto-Life triggers, destroy this card.

${modID}:Ether.NAME: Ether
${modID}:Ether.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E] energy. NL Gain cannot exceed maximum energy capacity. NL Fleeting.
${modID}:Ether.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E] energy. NL Gain cannot exceed maximum energy capacity. NL Fleeting.

${modID}:AttackMimicry.NAME: Attack Mimicry
${modID}:AttackMimicry.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random basic Attack cards to Play. NL Replace all 'Attack Mimicry' cards into to chosen card for the rest of combat.
${modID}:AttackMimicry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random basic Attack cards to Play. NL Replace all 'Attack Mimicry' cards into to chosen card for the rest of combat.

${modID}:DefendMimicry.NAME: Defend Mimicry
${modID}:DefendMimicry.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random basic Attack cards to Play. NL Replace all 'Defend Mimicry' cards into to chosen card for the rest of combat.
${modID}:DefendMimicry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random basic Attack cards to Play. NL Replace all 'Defend Mimicry' cards into to chosen card for the rest of combat.

${modID}:Libra.NAME: Libra
${modID}:Libra.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card per enemy. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Libra.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card per enemy. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:IfritHellfire.NAME: Ifrit: Hellfire
${modID}:IfritHellfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Astral_Fire affects Hellfire 2 times. NL Gain !M! + ${modID}:Materia ${modID}:Astral_Fire.
${modID}:IfritHellfire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Astral_Fire affects Hellfire 2 times. NL Gain !M! + ${modID}:Materia ${modID}:Astral_Fire.

${modID}:ShivaDiamondDust.NAME: Shiva: DiamondDust
${modID}:ShivaDiamondDust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage to ALL enemies. NL Trigger your ${modID}:Umbral_Ice. NL Gain !M! + ${modID}:Materia ${modID}:Umbral_Ice.
${modID}:ShivaDiamondDust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:Ranged damage to ALL enemies. NL Trigger your ${modID}:Umbral_Ice. NL Gain !M! + ${modID}:Materia ${modID}:Umbral_Ice.

${modID}:RamuhJudgmentBolt.NAME: Ramuh: JudgmentBolt
${modID}:RamuhJudgmentBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Ranged damage to a random enemy !M! + ${modID}:Materia times. NL Deal (!ffzim:M2!) damage to the target equal to the total damage dealt.
${modID}:RamuhJudgmentBolt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Ranged damage to a random enemy !M! + ${modID}:Materia times. NL Deal (!ffzim:M2!) damage to the target equal to the total damage dealt.

${modID}:Holy.NAME: Holy
${modID}:Holy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !ffzim:M2! times X damage (!D!). Damage is Modify based on enemy difficulty: Minions 0.5X, Normal X, Elite 1.5X, Boss 2X.
${modID}:Holy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !ffzim:M2! times X damage(!D!). Damage is Modify based on enemy difficulty: Minions 0.5X, Normal X, Elite 1.5X, Boss 2X.

${modID}:MagicTag.NAME: Magic Tag
${modID}:MagicTag.DESCRIPTION: Choose and remove 1 Curse card in your hand and from your deck.

${modID}:HolyWater.NAME: Holy Water
${modID}:HolyWater.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Status cards in your hand.

${modID}:Hilt.NAME: Hilt
${modID}:Hilt.FLAVOR: A solitary hilt, etched with the echoes of heroic deeds, seeks the partner blade whose absence leaves it incomplete.

${modID}:Blade.NAME: Blade
${modID}:Blade.FLAVOR: A forgotten blade of valor, seeking the hilt's embrace to awaken its dormant might.

${modID}:Excalibur.NAME: Excalibur
${modID}:Excalibur.FLAVOR: A symbol of heroism, Excalibur shines brightly with the union of its hilt, ready for noble deeds.

${modID}:ExcaliburII.NAME: Excalibur II
${modID}:ExcaliburII.FLAVOR: The legendary Excalibur II, awakened by your swift journey, foretells a path to victory.

${modID}:UnicornHorn.NAME: Unicorn Horn
${modID}:UnicornHorn.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL Buffs and Debuffs from yourself and ALL enemies.

${modID}:ItemLore.NAME: Item Lore
${modID}:ItemLore.DESCRIPTION: The first ${modID}:Item card you play each turn is played twice.

${modID}:ChocoBlast.NAME: Choco Blast
${modID}:ChocoBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! plus ${modID}:AttRank (!M!) ${modID}:Ranged damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ChocoUnleash.NAME: Choco Unleash
${modID}:ChocoUnleash.DESCRIPTION: Create a ${modID}:Shadow copy of an Attack card in your hand. The copy's cost is reduced by 50% of your ${modID}:AttRank (!M!).

${modID}:Throw.NAME: Throw
${modID}:Throw.DESCRIPTION: Choose and Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage plus additional damage based on its rarity. NL Common 3, Uncommon 6 and Rare 9.
${modID}:Throw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose and Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage plus additional damage based on its rarity. NL Common 4, Uncommon 8 and Rare 12.

${modID}:Pinwheel.NAME: Pinwheel
${modID}:Pinwheel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Ranged damage. NL When Exhausted with the 'Throw' card, 'Throw' deals double additional damage.

${modID}:RisingSun.NAME: Rising Sun
${modID}:RisingSun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Ranged damage. NL When Exhausted with the 'Throw' card, 'Throw' deals double additional damage.

${modID}:WingEdge.NAME: Wing Edge
${modID}:WingEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Ranged damage. NL When Exhausted with the 'Throw' card, 'Throw' deals double additional damage.

${modID}:ItemCommand.NAME: Item Command
${modID}:ItemCommand.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 random Common ${modID}:Item card to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ItemCommand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 1 random Uncommon ${modID}:Item card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CombatCommand.NAME: Combat Command
${modID}:CombatCommand.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, deal !D! damage. Otherwise gain !B! Block.
${modID}:CombatCommand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, deal !D! damage. Otherwise gain !B! Block.

${modID}:RowCommand.NAME: Row Command
${modID}:RowCommand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Startup. NL Gain Back-Row or Front-Row.
